thread.title: Paul Gauguin Cruises Named A Top Cruise Line In The World

author: cbs8
title: Paul Gauguin Cruises Named A Top Cruise Line In The World
text:
Paul Gauguin Cruises
Andrew Harper 2015 Readers' Choice Winners Announced
BELLEVUE, Wash. , Sept. 17, Paul Gauguin Cruises is proud to announce that it has been recognized in Andrew Harper's 2015 Readers' Choice awards, showcasing subscribers' favorite hotels, resorts, and cruise lines worldwide. Paul Gauguin Cruises was voted #5 on this year's list of top cruise lines.
The results are based on the annual independent Reader Survey in which Andrew Harper's discerning readers vote for the best hotels, resorts, safari lodges, and cruise ships around the world. This year's Readers' Choice Awards boast 122 hotels in 51 destinations and 10 cruise lines.
Andrew Harper's Hideaway Report is a leading source of information about luxury travel, having provided candid and insightful reviews to its subscribers for more than 35 years.
For a full list of winning properties, visit https://www.andrewharper.com/readers-choice .
Follow the Andrew Harper's 2015 Readers' Choice Awards conversation on Twitter with @HarperTravel, #ahreaderschoice, and on Facebook at Facebook.com/AndrewHarperTravel.
About Andrew Harper
Free of hotel advertising since its inception in June 1979 , the Hideaway Report is a monthly publication for a private community of sophisticated travelers. The selection of hotels, resorts, and restaurants is made on a completely independent basis, with Andrew Harper , LLC paying full rate for all meals, lodging and related travel expenses. Andrew Harper and his editors travel incognito to write candid and insightful reviews. For more information about Andrew Harper , visit AndrewHarper.com , and follow Andrew Harper on Twitter at @HarperTravel and on Facebook at Facebook.com/AndrewHarperTravel.
Media Contact: Emily Allen , Andrew Harper , (512) 904-7323, eallen@andrewharper.com
About Paul Gauguin Cruises
Owned by Pacific Beachcomber S.C., French Polynesia's leading luxury hotel and cruise operator, Paul Gauguin Cruises operates the 5+-star cruise ship, the 332-guest m/s Paul Gauguin , providing a deluxe cruise experience tailored to the unparalleled wonders of Tahiti, French Polynesia , and the South Pacific. The Gauguin's accolades include recognition as one of the "Top 20 Small Cruise Ships" in 2013 for the 15 th year in a row by readers of Conde Nast Traveler . The m/v Tere Moana offers voyages in the Caribbean , Latin America , and Europe , accommodating 88 guests with a staff of 62. In 2013, The Moana received "Best New Small Ship" and "Best Way to See the Greek Isles" in Cruisereport.com's Editor's Choice Awards. In addition, Paul Gauguin Cruises was voted by Travel + Leisure readers "#1 Small-Ship Cruise Line" and "#1 Small-Ship Cruise Line for Families" in the Travel + Leisure 2014 World's Best Awards. Recently, readers voted the line "#2 Small-Ship Ocean Cruise Line" in the Travel + Leisure 2015 World's Best Awards.
Media Contact: Vanessa Bloy , Paul Gauguin Cruises, (425) 440-6255, vbloy@pgcruises.com
